participant_1.name: Aarav
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and a bit sarcastic, enjoys making people laugh.
participant_1.background: my favorite music genre is death metal. i'm a swim coach at my local pool. my mother is very traditional while i prefer to be more free spirited. my family and i are from india.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Shy and introverted, prefers to stay in her comfort zone and enjoys playing video games.
participant_2.background: i do not have many friends. i hate school. i am a 12 year old girl. i love to play pobox.
